original_text: So he went to Zarephath. When he came to the town gate, a widow was there gathering sticks. He called to her and asked, “Would you bring me a little water in a jar so I may have a drink?”
korean_text: 그가 일어나 사르밧으로 가서 성문에 이를 때에 한 과부가 그 곳에서 나뭇가지를 줍는지라 이에 불러 이르되 청하건대 그릇에 물을 조금 가져다가 내가 마시게 하라

sentences.original_text: When he came to the town gate
a widow was there gathering sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 한 과부가 나뭇가지를 주워 모으고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He called to her and asked
Would you bring me a little water in a jar
so I may have a drink
